forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: show profile

comments.text: a new command. when touched then show profile. also a way to copy a player id since names can be changed.
please! the way i give people my profile is i leave a card for them to laser, but for new players, it may be difficult to grasp. this would make it so much easier! thanks, fazzi!
how bout open dialog [name] so it we could have all the menus -philipp ... do it
